title: Animals Open Door to Sensory Abilities of Humans
itunes:title: Animals Open Door to Sensory Abilities of Humans
description:
Jackie Higgins, Author and Filmmaker at Oxford Scientific Films, discusses her book "Sentient: How Animals Illuminate the Wonder of Our Human Senses."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
